name: askName
text: Welcome to $(askName) dooit! What is your name?

name: askPasswordOne
text: We need you to create a password so that I can make sure it is always you who is accessing your savings information. Reply with a password 8 letters or digits long. Dont worry I'll hide what you're typing so noone can see.

name: askPasswordTwo
text: Will you type it one more time so that I can check if I have saved it correctly?

name: validationFailName
text: Sorry, I don't understand that and haven't been taught how to handle it yet.

name: validationFailNumber
text: Sorry, I don't understand that and haven't been taught how to handle it yet.

name: validationFailPassword
text: Invalid answer. Please enter 8 or more characters(letters/numbers/special characters(- . _ ` ~ @ # $ & *)).

name: infoOnboardingEnd
text: Thank you. That concludes the registration process.
